pullrequest.title: First part of MassMatrix3 class, mostly accessors and modifiers

content.raw:
There's two aspects to a "valid" `MassMatrix3`:

* positive mass and positive definite moment of inertia matrix (test with `IsPositive`, most expensive operation is a 3x3 matrix construction and determinant)
* Principal moments must satisfy the triangle inequality (test with `IsValid`). If the inertia matrix is not diagonalized, then it must be diagonalized (function to come in a future pull request), which is a more complex operation.
content.html:
There's two aspects to a "valid" MassMatrix3:

  • positive mass and positive definite moment of inertia matrix (test with IsPositive, most expensive operation is a 3x3 matrix construction and determinant)
  • Principal moments must satisfy the triangle inequality (test with IsValid). If the inertia matrix is not diagonalized, then it must be diagonalized (function to come in a future pull request), which is a more complex operation.
